In England, in the seven days to 04 February, there were 493,025 new confirmed cases (871.8 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 28 January, there were 611,865 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 19% (118,840 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 09 February is 15,447,906 (27,317.2 cases per 100,000 population).
